about_the_game:
Mina's planning to soak up some rays and enjoy a relaxing day at the beach. This DLC pack includes an all-new skin and portraits featuring Mina's Beach Bum outfit.

After installation, you can select costumes from the main menu with the click of a button!
detailed_description:
Mina's planning to soak up some rays and enjoy a relaxing day at the beach. This DLC pack includes an all-new skin and portraits featuring Mina's Beach Bum outfit.

After installation, you can select costumes from the main menu with the click of a button!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64Bit)
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with hardware 3D acceleration
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster / equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Earphones!
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64Bit)
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia / AMD GPU with 256 MB or more
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster / equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Play alone with earphones!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 (64Bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with hardware 3D acceleration
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster / equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Earphones!
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Version 10.6.8 or above (64Bit)
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia / AMD GPU with 256 MB or more
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster / equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Play alone with earphones!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP (64Bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with hardware 3D acceleration
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster / equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Earphones! x64, .Net 3.5
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: i5 or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 7900 / equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster / equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Play alone with earphones! x64, .Net 3.5
